officialDesc: Founded in 1972, Oakes College is a multicultural community committed to equality and freedom from oppression and to providing the highest quality education to students from diverse backgrounds. Poised at the edge of UCSCâ€™s natural preserve, Oakes is also at the leading edge of scholarship, community-building, and integrated co-curricular experiences.
studentDesc: Really, really, unique buildings. Dorms all have walls made of wood shingling, so it's a super unique vibe. Known for Oakes cafe, Oakes garden, the meadow, and Oakes bridge, Oaks has a very cozy and unique atmosphere. Also, awesome ocean views is a plus.
